## getDirectoryListing() function

Returns a list of files and directories within a given directory.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getDirectoryListing(dir: string, showHidden?: boolean): Promise<DirectoryEntry[]>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

The directory path to list


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

showHidden


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether to include hidden files (starting with .)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[DirectoryEntry](./filesystem.directoryentry.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;
